channel.title: Automatically Teleblocked!
channel.description:
Hey, how can I make it so when someone enter's the wilderness they automatically get teleblocked? It's pretty annoying having people teleport out of the wilderness while in battle. Thank You and have a nice day!
- Eric E.

item.title: Automatically Teleblocked!
item.dc:creator: @traxxas traxxas
item.description:
@traxxas wrote:

Ahh Rich, You be a pube. This is what you does. You needs to take dat thing that Rich gave you, And pwn it. Just modify it. If you keep getting errors, Just take it out and try something else -.O. Lot’s of people have tutorials. Just look around, Maybe a person will end up posting one ;D.

Read full topic

item.title: Automatically Teleblocked!
item.dc:creator: @Eric_E Eric E.
item.description:
@Eric_E wrote:

Thanks! It worked!

  • Eric E.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 24, 2008, 06:26:40 pm[/size][hr]Ffs, nevermind. You gave me 100 Error’s.

  • Eric E.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 24, 2008, 06:41:17 pm[/size][hr]Nvm, I fixed it, thanks! :P.

  • Eric E.

Read full topic

item.title: Automatically Teleblocked!
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Okay, then make it check in the command, such as;

[code] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“home”)) {

	if (absX >= 2940 && absX <= 3400 && absY >= 3672 && absY <= 3970) {
			sendMessage("You can't teleport above level 20 wilderness!");
		} else {
			Teleport(2222, 3333, 0);
	}
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Automatically Teleblocked!
item.dc:creator: @Eric_E Eric E.
item.description:
@Eric_E wrote:

Uhh…? None of my teleport’s work. I mean like when they type in a command teleport. Such as ::home or something like that.

  • Eric E.

Read full topic

item.title: Automatically Teleblocked!
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Basically, on your teleports, just make it check if they are in wilderness before allowing them to teleport.

Read full topic
